name: HubSpot Outbound Connector
description: Manage contacts, companies, and deals in HubSpot

keywords: get all contacts of a company

properties.label: Type
properties.description: Choose the authentication type. Select 'None' if no authentication is necessary

properties.label: Bearer token
properties.description: The access token of your HubSpot private app.

properties.label: Resource type
properties.description: Choose resource type

choices.name: Get all contacts of a company

properties.value: =if list contains(["post-api.hsforms.com/submissions"], operationType) then "https://api.hsforms.com" else if list contains(["post-/automation/v2/workflows/{workflowId}/enrollments/contacts"], operationType) then "https://api.hubapi.com" else "https://api.hubspot.com"

properties.label: Next page after object id
properties.description: The id of the object from which to retrieve the next page.

properties.label: Contact id
properties.description: The id of the contact to get.

properties.label: Additional properties that should be returned
properties.description: Names of the additional properties as a comma separated list, e.g. city,annualrevenue. Get all contact properties here and learn more about default contact properties here. Leave this empty to get only standard properties.

properties.label: Contact ids
properties.description: The ids of the contacts to get.

properties.value: ={"inputs": for id in batchReadIds   return { id:  id  } }

properties.label: Search field
properties.description: The field within the object to perform the search on, e.g. lastname

properties.label: Search value
properties.description: The value to search for, e.g. Smith

properties.label: Properties
properties.description: Properties of the contact

properties.label: Company id
properties.description: Company id the contact should be associated with

properties.value: ={"properties": if properties = null then null else properties, "associations": associations}
={"properties": if properties = null then null else properties}

properties.label: Contact id
properties.description: The id of the contact that should be updated.

properties.label: Contact id
properties.description: The id of the contact that should be deleted.

properties.label: Contact id
properties.description: The id of the contact

properties.label: Company id
properties.description: The id of the company

properties.label: Company id
properties.description: The id of the company to get.

properties.label: Company id
properties.description: The id of the company for which to retrieve the contacts.

properties.label: Company properties
properties.description: The properties of the company

properties.label: Deal id
properties.description: The id of the deal to get.

properties.label: Deal id
properties.description: The id of the deal that should be deleted.

properties.label: Portal id
properties.description: The HubSpot account that the form belongs to. Learn more.

properties.label: Form id
properties.description: The unique ID of the form you're sending data to. Learn more.

properties.label: Form fields
properties.description: The values to submit to the form. Learn more.

properties.label: List id
properties.description: The ID of the list where the object should be added to.

properties.label: Object ids
properties.description: The ids of the objects, e.g. contacts or companies, to add to the list

properties.label: Workflow id
properties.description: The ID of the workflow that should be triggered.

properties.label: Contact email
properties.description: The email of the contact that should be enrolled to the workflow.

properties.label: Result variable
properties.description: Name of variable to store the response in

properties.label: Result expression
properties.description: Expression to map the response into process variables

properties.label: Error expression
properties.description: Expression to handle errors. Details in the documentation.

properties.label: Retries
properties.description: Number of retries

properties.label: Retry backoff
properties.description: ISO-8601 duration to wait between retries
